data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to the SEBI (PIT) Regulations 2015 read with Circular issued by the Stock Exchanges on 02/04/2019 this is to inform you that the Trading Window for dealing in securities of Suryalakshmi Cotton Mills Limited would remain closed from Tuesday 01/07/2025 till 48 hours after the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 30/06/2025 would be filed with exchanges.  The date of the Board meeting for consideration of the unaudited financial results would be intimated in due course.

data.caption: Compliances-Reg.24(A)-Annual Secretarial Compliance
data.news_body: In terms of Reg 24(A) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are enclosing herewith Annual  Secretarial Compliance Report duly issued by M/s. KVC Reddy & Associates Company Secretaries for the financial year ended March 31 2025.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter / Year Ended 31/03/2025
data.news_body: As per Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are herewith enclosing a copy of the audited financial results along with statements of assets & liabilities cash flow and audit report for the year ended 31/03/2025 at their meeting held on 27/05/2025.  The Board regretted its inability to recommend any dividend.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For The Quarter / Year Ended 31/03/2025
data.news_body: As per Regulation 33 of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we are herewith enclosing a copy of the audited financial results along with statements of assets & liabilities cash flow and audit report for the year ended 31/03/2025 at their meeting held on 27/05/2025.  The Board regretted its inability to recommend any dividend.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For The Quarter / Year Ended 31/03/2025
data.news_body: As per regulation 33 of the SEBI we are herewith enclosing a copy of the audited financial results along with statements of Assets & Liabilities Cash Flow and Audit Report for the year ended 31/03/2025.  Under Regulation 30 upon recommendation of Nomination & Remuneration committee the Board approved the reappointment of Sri Paritosh Agarwal as Managing Director for a tenure of 5 years subject to approval of shareholders and upon recommendation of the audit committee the Board approved the appointment of M/s. K V C Reddy & Associates as Secretarial auditor of the company subject to approval of the shareholders.

data.caption: Board Meeting Intimation for Audited Financial Results For The Year Ended 31St March 2025.
data.news_body:
Suryalakshmi Cotton Mills Ltdhas informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 27/05/2025 inter alia to consider and approve We have to inform you that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company has been convened on Tuesday 27/05/2025 to consider inter alia and approve and take on record the Audited Financial Results of the Company for the year ended 31st March 2025.

There is no proposal to consider recommendation of payment of dividend for the year 2024-25.

data.caption: Compliances-Certificate under Reg. 74 (5) of SEBI (DP) Regulations 2018

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 30 we would like to inform that Sri Arvind Sadashiv Mokashi DIN-09305967 has resigned as Non-Executive Independent Director and automatically ceases to be a member of Audit Committee and Nomination & Remuneration Committee and Chairperson of Stakeholders Relationship Committee w.e.f. 25/12/2024.

Sri Santosh Kumar Agarwal has been appointed as Chief Financial Officer w.e.f. 01/01/2025.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI (PIT) Regulations 2015 this is to inform that the Trading Window for dealing in securities of Suryalakshmi Cotton  Mills Limited would remain closed from Wednesday 1st January 2025 till 48 hours after the unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 31st December 2024 would be filed with Exchanges.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that based on the recommendation of NRC and approval of the Board of Directors, the members of the Company have appointed Sri Malapally Chowda Reddy Balaji (DIN-06964971) as a Non-Executive Independent Director of the Company for a term of five years w.e.f. 16/12/2024 through Postal Ballot.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizers Report
data.news_body: Pursuant to regulation 44(3) of the SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we hereby submit that the remote e-voting process concluded on 15/12/2024 at 5:00 p.m., post which the scrutinizer has submitted the report on the voting results of the postal ballot.  Based on the report of the scrutinizer, we hereby inform that the special resolution for Appointment of Dr. Malapally Chowda Reddy Balaji (DIN-06964971) as a Non-Executive Independent Director was passed by the Members with requisite majority.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Scrutinizers Report
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 44(3) of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we hereby submit that Postal Ballot through remote e-voting process concluded on Sunday, 15/12/2024 at 5:00 p.m. post which the scrutinizer has submitted the Report on the voting results of the Postal Ballot.  Based on the report of the scrutinizer, we hereby inform that a special resolution for Appointment of Dr. Malapally Chowda Reddy Balaji, DIN 06964971, as a Non-Executive Independent Director was passed by the Members with requisite majority.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Notice of Postal Ballot
data.news_body: Further to the outcome of Board Meeting on 13/11/2024, enclosing a copy of the postal ballot notice dated 14/11/2024 to seek approval of the members for an appointment of Dr. Malapally Chowda Reddy Balaji (DIN - 06964971) as an Independent Director.  The cut-off date being 08/11/2024.  The remote e-voting will commence from 16/11/2024 and conclude on 15/12/2024.  Th results will be declared on 16/12/2024 and for this purpose the company has engaged services of Kfin Technologies Ltd.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Unaudited Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30/09/2024 And Recommended Appointment Of Dr. M. C. Balaji (DIN-06964971) As An Independent Director.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 33 in the Board Meeting held on Wednesday, 13/11/2024, the Board has considered and approved unaudited financial results for the quarter ended 30/09/2024 and recommended appointment of Dr. M. C. Balaji (DIN-06964971) as a Non-Executive Independent Director for a period of 5 years subject to approval of shareholders in the ensuing Postal Ballot.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30/09/2024.
data.news_body: We would like to inform that in the Board Meeting held on Wednesday, 13/11/2024, pursuant to regulation 30 and regulation 33, the board has considered and approved the unaudited financial results along with limited review report for quarter ended 30/09/2024 and recommended appointment of Dr. M. C. Balaji (DIN-06964971) as a Independent director for a period of 5 years subject to approval of members in the ensuing postal ballot.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results For Quarter Ended 30/09/2024.
data.news_body: We would like to inform that in the Board Meeting held on Wednesday, 13/11/2024, pursuant to regulation 30 and regulation 33, the board has considered and approved the unaudited financial results along with limited review report for quarter ended 30/09/2024 and recommended appointment of Dr. M. C. Balaji (DIN-06964971) as a Independent director for a period of 5 years subject to approval of members in the ensuing postal ballot.

Buddhavarapu Mahadeva Vijaya Kumar (CFO) of the Company has resigned and he shall stand relieved from his duties with effect from closing business hours on 17th October, 2024.  A Copy of his resignation is enclosed herewith.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Change in Management
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 read with Part A of Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform you that based on the recommendation of NRC/Board of Directors, the members of the Company at the AGM on 22/08/2024 have:1.  Appointed Sri R. Surender Reddy, DIN - 00083972, as a Non-Executive Non-Independent Director who is liable to retire by rotation.2.  Reappointed Sri. L. N. Agarwal, DIN-00008721) as a Chairman & Managing Director for a period of 5 years.3.  Appointed Smt. Aruna Prasad, DIN - 07164087) as a Non-Executive Independent Director for a period of 5 years..The details of the appointed directors and the list of directors as on 22/08/2024 are enclosed.Kindly take the above information on record.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Credit Rating
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30(6) read with Schedule III of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we would like to inform that the surveillance of ICRA-assigned credit rating of the Company for Rs. 417.75 crore bank facilities, the Rating Committee of ICRA has reaffirmed the long-term rating at [ICRA] BBB and short-term rating at [ICRA]A3+.  The outlook on the long-term rating is stable.

data.caption: Reg. 34 (1) Annual Report.
data.news_body: In connection with the AGM to be held on Thursday, 22nd August, 2024, please find enclosed the Notice for AGM and also the Annual Report for the year 2023-24.  This is for your information and taking this on record.

data.caption: 61St Annual General Meeting Intimation And Book Closure
data.news_body: The 61st Annual General Meeting of the company is scheduled on Thursday, 22nd August, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. through video conferencing at registered office situated at 6th Floor, Surya Towers, 105 S. P. Road, Secunderabad - 500003.Pursuant to Regulation 42 of SEBI (LODR) 2015, the Register of Members and Share Transfer books of the Company will remain closed from Monday, 12th August, 2024 to Thursday 22nd August, 2024 for taking record of the Members of the Company for the purpose of AGM of the Company.

data.caption: 61St Annual General Meeting On 22Nd August, 2024 At 11:00 A.M. At Registered Office
data.news_body: The 61st Annual General Meeting of the Company is scheduled to be held on Thursday, 22nd August, 2024 at 11:00 a.m. through video conferencing at the Registered Office of the Company situated at 6th Floor, Surya Towers, 105 S. P. Road, Secunderabad - 500 003.Pursuant to Regulation 42 of SEBI (LODR) 2015, the register of members and share transfer books will remain closed from Monday, 12th August, 2024 to Thursday, 22nd August, 2024 for the purpose of AGM of the Company.

data.caption: Corrigendum In Respect Of Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body: Sri Surender Reddy Ramasahayam (DIN-00083972) who ceased to be an Independent Director of the company w.e.f. 31/03/2024 upon completion of his tenure of second term of five consecutive years, was appointed as an Additional Director designated as Non-Executive Non-Independent Director of the Company liable to retire by rotation subject to approval of the members at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Fire Accident In The Finishing Line Of Denim Division At Ramtek In Maharashtra
data.news_body: We have to inform you that yesterday morning there was a fire accident in the finishing line of Denim Division at Ramtek in Maharashtra.  The fire has been put out and the loss, not expected to be material, is being assessed and there has been no loss of human life and this accident is not expected to cause   any disruption of operations in Denim Division.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Audited Financial Results For Year Ended 31/03/2024.

data.caption: Update on board meeting
data.news_body: SURYALAKSHMI COTTON MILLS LTD.has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company is scheduled on 24/05/2024 ,inter alia, to consider and approve Further to our notice to exchange on 14th May, 2024 we have to inform you there is no proposal to recommend payment of dividend for the year 2023-24.

data.caption: Shareholder Meeting / Postal Ballot-Outcome of AGM
data.news_body: In terms of Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR), we hereby inform that the following businesses were transacted (Audited statement of P&L, Appointment of Director, ratify creation of mortgage, appointment of Mr. Arvind Sadashiv Mokashi, ratify the remuneration of cost auditor) at 60th AGM on 30/09/2023 through Video conference.  The time of commencement of the meeting is 10:30 AM and conclusion of the meeting is 11:10 AM.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to the SEBI (PTI) Regulations, 2015, this is to inform you that the Trading Window for dealing in securities of Suryalakshmi Cotton Mills Limited would remain closed from Monday 1st April, 2024 till 48 hours after the financial results for the quarter ended 31st March, 2024 would be filed with Exchanges.  The date of the Board Meeting for consideration of the financial results would be intimated in due course.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Corporate Debt Restructuring
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, the company is pleased to inform that it has complied with all the terms and conditions for exiting from the Debt Restructuring Arrangement with the lenders namely payment of Right of Recompense amount to lenders, banks have aligned the interest rates in line with market rates consequent to withdrawal of concessional interest rates, repayment of all old term loan facilities and funded interest.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Demise
data.news_body: In compliance with Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015, we regret to inform you about sudden and sad demise of Sri Navrang Lal Tibrewal, Non-executive Independent Director of the Company on 8th January, 2024.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results For Quarter Ended 31St March, 2023
data.news_body:
As per Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are herewith enclosing a copy of the Audited Financial Results along with statements of Assets & Liabilities, Cash Flow, Segment results and Audit Report for the year ended 31/03/2023, which were taken on record by the Board of Directors at their meeting held on 29/05/2023. We hereby confirm that the Statutory Auditors of the Company i.e., M/s. Brahmayya & Co., Chartered Accountants have issued the Audit Reports on Annual Financial Statements of the Company for the Financial year ended March 31, 2023 with unmodified opinion.

The Board regretted its inability to recommend any Dividend.

The time of commencement of meeting is 12:30 p.m. and time of conclusion of the meeting is 3:40 p.m.

This is for your information and records.
